name: MobClicker
description:
Solo & First attempt at a GameJam

First time using JavaFX

Ironically, it ended up extra spammy. "Monsters" (They are boxes) are supposed to start with one life but somehow they survive being clicked! Spook(tober)y!

Had fun with this. Will most likely update for highscores and try to deploy to web at some point.

10/10 would jam again

https://github.com/OliCunnington/MobClicker_OpenGameJam2018
